amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-439 to express the sense of Congress that in situations where a requesting agency obtains expedited action to approve a merger transaction application between multiple depository institutions, that careful consideration is placed on the impact that the transaction will have on affected communities and customers of any or all of the applicant institutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 225 (Roll no. 67).
